concepts.description: This appears to be a standalone phrase, possibly a continuation from a previous screen or a single entry without a bolded title
a piece of storage furniture that you pull out and push in
internal or external factors that shape change in an organization
to make a mistake or miss an opportunity
to no longer exist or be available
to completely remove something that is not wanted or needed
a person who is paid to work for another person or a company
a person or company that pays people to work for them
to experience a situation, especially something that is unexpected or unpleasant
to state publicly that you approve of or support someone or something
with a lot of energy
feeling or showing a lot of excitement and interest
to start or create
to make a bad situation worse
having skill or knowledge because you have done something many times
a building or set of buildings where large amounts of goods are made using machines
a company owned by family members
to move or handle something repeatedly with the hands and fingers in a nervous way
to add information in spaces on an official document
to make something more definite
a type of employment that has a specified start and end date
starting and finishing work when you want
to make a short, sudden movement that causes something to move
a type of diagram that represents a workflow or process
to keep changing and becoming higher and lower
